targets.query: SELECT non_negative_difference(last("TotalBytesReceved64")) FROM "FritzBox" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(7d)
SELECT non_negative_difference(last("TotalBytesSent64")) FROM "FritzBox" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d)
SELECT non_negative_difference(last("TotalBytesSent64")) FROM "FritzBox" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(7d)
